dn17:1.3.8: iddhā ceva hoti phītā ca → iddhā ceva ahosi phītā ca (sya-all, km); iddhā ceva phītā ca (pts1ed)
dn17:1.8.3: pavatti → pavattati (sya-all, km, mr) | anvadeva → anudeva (sya-all, km)
dn17:1.15.2: mānusivaṇṇaṁ → mānusaṁ vaṇṇaṁ (bj, pts1ed); mānussīvaṇṇaṁ (sya-all, km)
dn17:1.15.7: aticari → aticārī (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed); aticarī (mr)
dn17:1.33.1: pokkharaṇiyā rājā mahāsudassano ‘ye → ye kho panānanda (sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr)
dn17:2.5.14: rañño, ānanda, mahāsudassanassa → idaṁ pāṭho pts1ed potthake natthi
dn17:2.12.2: puñchitvā → pamajjitvā (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed); puñjitvā (mr)
dn17:2.13.7: brahmacariyaṁ cari → brahmacariyaṁ ācari (sya-all, km); brahmacariyamacari (mr) | gihibhūto → gihībhūto (bj, pts1ed); gīhibhūto (km)
